name: RiskIQ
description:
RiskIQ protects corporate brands and their customers on the internet. The company combines a worldwide proxy network with synthetic clients that emulate real users to monitor, detect and take down malicious and copycat apps, drive by malware and malvertisements.Â 
RiskIQ is being used by leading financial institutions and brands in the US to protect their web assets and visitors/users from security threats and fraud. RiskIQ is backed by growth equity firms Summit Partners and Battery Ventures.
